Method.Title: Open Lock (C)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs ATM ID, MIDDLE NAME, TOUCH KEY ID, DATE, HOUR, TIME BLOCK and LOCK STATUS.

Method.Title: Open Lock No Touch Key (C)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs ATM ID, MIDDLE NAME, TIME, DATE and TIME BLOCK.

Method.Title: Open Lock Now (1C)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs ATM ID and MIDDLE NAME.

Method.Title: Close Code (C)
Method.Description: This command will close an active operation code that matches the input ATM ID, OPERATOR CODE and OPERATION RESULT.

Method.Title: Close Code Via A Seal (C)
Method.Description: This command will close an operation code using the C Seal value.
